title: Understanding the Role of Instructional Designers in Higher Education: A Qualitative Research-Based Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies Required for Mathematics Curriculum Design for Professionals in Medical/Legal/Technical Fields

learning_goals: Explain three core roles and responsibilities of an instructional designer in higher education settings
Develop a framework for evaluating instructional design cases using qualitative research methods (interview analysis)
Apply project management techniques performed by instructional designers when designing online mathematics courses
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
